## ElementController.renderTemplate() method

Renders the provided template to the element.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected renderTemplate(template: ElementViewTemplate | null | undefined): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

template


</td><td>

[ElementViewTemplate](../fast-element.elementviewtemplate/) \| null \| undefined


</td><td>

The template to render.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

If `null` is provided, any existing view will be removed.
